Title: Identifying static analysis techniques for finding non-fix hunks in fix revisions
Elements_risk_assessment: They do not consider the idea of clean lines at the moment of their injection
UseOF-SZZ: they have the similar idea than us about the SZZ and the buggy parts in a fixed commit. They said that not all fixed hunks are bug-fix hunks
Summary: Their goal is to remove the non-fix hunks in the bug-fix revisions automatically
Outcome: A list of cases when the previous lines didn't cause the fix-bug. They want to answer  'which hunks are non-fix hunks?' and 'how can we detect non-fix hunks?'. We found that there are many patterns which require semantic analysis and therefore not recognizable by the previous approaaches
